get.summary: Get a list of all companies. Only available for GR Admin

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Required body fields are country, email, name

delete.description: Sets a company's deleted_on to the date and the deleted_by with the JWT IDP ID

put.summary: Add company members and manage company permissions
put.description: Admins can add and remove other admins and members. An IDP ID has to be in the member list to be added to the update_company, delete_company, and create_collection. Setting member to false deletes the IDP ID from the company and removes all other permissions

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Get all collections of a certain company

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: Get all collections made by a certain user

parameters.name: created_on
parameters.description: Get all collections made on a certain day

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Get a collection by its name

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Get all collections in a project

post.summary: Add a new collection to the company

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Required body fields are name and company_id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Document object given by the client to the server

delete.summary: Delete a collection and all its media

put.summary: Chage a company member's collection permissions
put.description: Admins can add and remove other admins and owners on top of having all other permissions. Owners can add and remove company members to have read_collection, update_collection, delete_collection, and post_media permissions. Owners can not add or remove admins or other owners

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: Get all media added by a certain user

parameters.name: created_on
parameters.description: Get all media made on a certain day

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: Get all media of a certain extension

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Get a media by its file name

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Get all media in a project

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Get all media of a certain type

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Array of an object that contains file name, location, and type

put.description: This endpoint can be used to reupload or change a media file by setting reupload in the body to true

put.summary: Change a company member's media permissions
put.description: Admins can add and remove other admins and owners on top of having all other permissions. Owners can add and remove company members to have read, update,  and delete permissions. Owners can not add or remove admins or other owners

MediaPermission.description: Designates user permissions of a media

Location.description: These values are obtained through the Google Reverse Geocoding API (https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/intro#GeocodingResponses) THIS WILL NOT BE A MODEL IN THE DB

All Possible Media Properties.description: THIS WILL NOT BE A MODEL IN THE DB
